author: mturk
msg: Get rid of the one-shot worker initialization scheme.
It doesn't work as it should, and it slows down the load balacer.
Once when service channel will be introduced it will take care of that.

author: mturk
msg: Instead of setting the entire worker to a error state, check the service
return value, and if it is set to the JK_HANDLER_ERROR, close the
connection to TC and skip other workers, cause the client is disconnected

author: mturk
msg: Use the logger for dump method instead of using stderr.

author: mturk
msg: For stream channels (sockets) use the supplied msg for
